title: Fresh Bus raises USD 10.5 mn in funding led by VC Maniv
description: Fresh Bus, an electric intercity bus startup, raised USD 10.5 million in a Series A round led by Maniv and supported by Shell Ventures, Alteria Capital, and Riverwalk Holdings. The new funds will be used for operations, technology enhancements, and expanding their bus fleet.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
